summary: A list of attractive female NPCs in Skyrim in spreadsheet form and information on them such as race, location, ID codes, my rating, etc.  Batch files to help ease the process.  An overview of the marriage system in Skyrim.  Helpful console codes.  My female Breton hottie starter save.  Lots of screenshots included!
descriptionHtml:
Hotties of Skyrim by CrushBoss

Change Log
===========
1.0 - Initial Release - Jan 30, 2012
1.1 - Updated Description, Readme, made minor improvements to the Spreedsheet, added missing Fastred screenshots, added additional screenshots for Abelone, Lydia, Karita, Katana, and Sapphire.  Moved Katana (my female Breton hottie) screenshots to it\'s own folder - Feb 1, 2012
1.2 - Updated Description and Readme with web links to all the mods I used.  Updated Marriage section.  Added Divorce section.  Added two more console codes to spreadsheet and PDF file.  Fixed resurrect syntax - Feb 5, 2012

What This Is
===========
A list of attractive female NPCs in Skyrim
Information and location codes of each hottie
Rating for each hottie based on their head appearance only
Ratings are based on my personal opinion
The first section contains marriable hotties - console codes may be required to activate
The second section contains non-marriable hotties of importance in Skyrim
Only hotties rated 7 or higher are listed (on a scale from 1 to 10)
Batch files to simplify the process of using console commands to marry and divorce
A copy of my female Breton hottie Katana (starter character)

What This Isn\'t
==============
A complete list of every female NPC in Skyrim
A complete list of every marriable NPC in Skyrim
A list of good looking male NPCs
A compilation of meshes and textures

Console Codes - WARNING
========================
Console codes have the potential to CRASH your game!  PLEASE make a backup copy of your Saves BEFORE using them.  You need to visit each hottie the old fashioned way (on foot) FIRST before using the console codes.  Not doing this may break the game and certain quests.
You have been warned.

Marriage
========
In order to marry in Skyrim you have to get and wear an Amulet of Mara and start the marriage quest from Maramal in Riften in the Temple of Mara.  Maramal will give you an Amulet of Mara as part of the marriage quest.  Some NPCs require that you complete a quest or series of quests for them or for the city\'s Yarl in order for the marriage option to appear.
Housecarls - Lydia, Iona, Argis the Bulwark, Calder, Jordis the Sword-Maiden (all require you to complete quests for the Yarl, Steward, Advisor, or Thane of the city).
Some hotties require that you finish a faction quest line in order to become available such as those in the Companion\'s, Thieves, and Dark Brotherhood guild.  After doing all relevant quests for the NPC, if the marriage option doesn\'t appear you will need to use console codes to make it work.

Once you propose you will need to go back to Maramal to arrange the wedding.  It will be held the next day in the Temple of Mara in Riften and your bride will show up.  After the ceremony your bride will disappear, no honeymoon I guess.  She can be found in her usual location.  Go speak with her and select a home for her.  All homes you own are an option as well as her home in most cases.  UPDATE:  Your new wife will leave immediately after you say \"I do\".
If you are quick you can talk with her before she leaves the Temple of Mara (hit TAB quickly and talk with her after saying \"I do\").  You can then select which home you want her to live in without having to track her down at her usual location.

NOTE:  Most people having trouble getting the marriage option to appear forget to wear the Amulet of Mara

Marriage Benefits
==============
Your spouse will cook you a hot meal once a day when requested and give you an extra resting bonus if you spend the night.

Divorce
======
In order to divorce your wife you will need to open up the console and target her so that her ID shows up on the screen.  Type in \'bat divorce\' (see Batch Files section below) without the quotes or type in the console codes listed in the \'Hotties of Skyrim\' spreadsheet or PDF file.  You then need to drop or sell your Amulet of Mara (you cannot have one in your inventory).  Talk with Maramal in the Temple of Mara in Riften and purchase a new Amulet of Mara.  Put it on and you are now free to marry a new wife.

Suggestions
===========
Suggestions are welcome as long as they are female, attractive, and have a unique look.  Flames and unprofessional comments will not be looked at.  I will only be looking at hotties that I consider to have a rating of 8 or higher.  There may have been a few that I missed.  Originally I had 5s and 6s listed but the list grew too large and might discourage people from using it.  I trimmed it down to what I feel is reasonable.  I don\'t think anyone wants to track down 50 ladies to see which one they like the best.  For this reason I only listed those who I felt were the best looking in the game.

Hotties List
===========
The hotties list is provided in Microsoft Excel and PDF format.  If you have Excel you can sort the list by rating, location, race, or anything you wish.  I have verified the NPC location codes from several sources.  For some reason in Skyrim the location codes don\'t always work and I haven\'t seen a rhyme or reason for it as one time they will work and another time they won\'t.  If all else fails go to the area listed and then to their location on the list.  Most of the hotties roam and wander and aren\'t always in the specified location.  Usually you can find them wandering around town, at the local Inn or Tavern, at the merchant booths in town, or at their home at night.

Screenshots
============
The screenshots are high quality close-ups of each hottie.  I converted them to JPG format to save space.  I have a high performance rig and used max graphic settings.  I had a difficult time getting good screenshots with good lighting.  For this reason some of the hotties (picture backgrounds) aren\'t in their normal area in Skyrim.  The hotties also don\'t always have their default outfits on.  I may fix this at a later time.

Batch Files
===========
I included two batch files that will save you time when forcing the marriage option or divorcing someone is Skyrim.

marry - forces the marriage option to work on nearly any NPC
divorce - forces divorce on your current wife - you are then free to marry someone else

To install the batch files you will need to copy marry.txt and divorce.txt into your Skyrim Data folder (..\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
To use these batch files open up the console using the ~ key, click on the hottie once (so their code shows up on the screen) and then type in \'bat marry\' or \'bat divorce\' without the quotes.

Hotties Look
============
In order to make the hotties look like they do in the screenshots you will need to have the following mods installed in this order:

XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
XCE - CBBE compatibility patch - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
Summer Fashion - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1384
Summer Fashion - less version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1384
Improved NPC Clothing - High Res - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674
Improved NPC Clothing - INPCC Expansion Pack - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674
Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE Armor Set - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654
Killer Keos Silly Huge Pack Addon - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654
UKC Uglykidcids CBBE Armor and Clothing Replacers - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4043
Millenia Weapon Retexture Project - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1754
Beautiful Skyrim - HD Weaponry - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1377
Female Elven Cuirass - Skimpier - CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5111
Female Khajiit Skin for CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2679
Catwalk - Normal - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5053
Skimpy Falmer Armor CBBEv2compatible - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4129
CBBE - Black Dragonplate - Top - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3867
CBBE - Black Dragonplate - Main - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3867
Blood Metal Daedric Armor and Weapons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1722#content
Cover Khajiits - Female and Male - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941#content
Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged - Male - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6085#content
CBBEv3 Imperial Armor Replacer Female - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7096#content
Revealing Skimpy Thieves Guild or GM Armor - Female - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4569
Daedric Female Armor Replacer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5162
CBBE Daedric Female - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6316
Somewhat Skimpy DragonScale Armor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5411
AOF Believable Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - CBBE - Silly Huge optional - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition - CBBE - Hip textures fix for clothing still using version 2 CBBE - Curvy - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Better Females by Bella - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Better Females by Bella - Makeup Version 3 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Better Females by Bella - No Face Shine (most screenshots were taken without this mod) - improves look - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
No More Blocky Faces (most screenshots were taken without this mod) - improves look - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30

If you use other mods that affect appearance your hotties may look different.   I also couldn\'t find certain armor types that looked good for the CBBE body type.
I changed the following:
Falmer -> Iron
Ebony -> Nightingale
You will need to copy files around in your meshes and texture folders in order to make this happen.  Don\'t do this unless you feel comfortable (advanced users only).
Make a backup copy of the Data folder first!  In other words if an NPC is wearing Falmer or Iron armor they look the same (Falmer meshes and textures).
The same goes for Ebony/Nightingale.
  
Facial and Hair Appearance
==========================
For those who only want to match the facial and hair appearance of the hotties and aren\'t concerned about the armor, clothing, or body type, you will need to install the following mods in this order:

XCE Character Enhancement
AOF Believable Hair
Better Females by Bella
Better Females by Bella - Makeup Version 3
Better Females by Bella - No Face Shine
No More Blocky Faces

Enjoy,

CrushBoss
author: CrushBoss
